Row.Text: After a long period of cooperation and friendship, the people of {@2_MinorCivName} have decided to join forces with {@1_CivName}! Sunshine and rainbows are visible in the skies above {@2_MinorCivName} and {@1_CivName} as the ponies below celebrate their friendship.
